attributes.action: Convert Central London State Owned Buildings into MP's Apartments
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the Commons Additional Costs Allowance element for MPs London Homes by providing each MP with a two-bedroom apartment close to the House of Commons.

These apartments would be created in excess Government buildings - Chelsea barracks would have been ideal.

The purpose of this would be to remove the possibility of abuse from the Commons Additional Costs Allowance.
